archived.title: Dead code audit — remove retired module registrations from index.js
archived.description: meta
archived.notes: Removed 18 zero-usage MCP component registrations from index.js. Kept 12 active components. API routes in api.mjs unaffected. (v1.80.0)

archived.title: Add structured session outcomes log (post-hook writes JSON per session)
archived.description: meta
archived.notes: Post-hook 16-structured-outcomes.sh writes JSON per session to session-outcomes.json. GET /outcomes API endpoint with mode/limit filters, success rate, total cost. (v1.81.0)

archived.title: API consolidation — use visitor tracking data to identify and retire unused endpoints
archived.description: meta
archived.notes: endpoint-audit.py + /audit endpoint using in-memory analytics. /analytics exposes allEndpoints (auth). 153 routes, full tracking. (v1.81.0)

archived.title: Add thecolony.cc to cross-platform feed aggregator
archived.description: Colony API is unauthenticated for reads: GET /api/v1/posts?sort=new. Add as feed source in api.mjs alongside MDI, LobChan, etc.
archived.notes: Added colony source to fetchFeedSources(), HTML filter link, source color (#06b6d4). Feed now aggregates 6 platforms. (v1.82.0)

archived.title: Session budget optimization — track per-tool-call costs from session logs
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: budget-analysis.py parses JSONL session logs, extracts per-turn token usage, maps costs to tool calls. GET /budget?sessions=N endpoint. Shows cost/call averages by tool. (v1.84.0)

archived.title: Platform health history — store probe results over time for trend analysis
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: platform-trends.py analyzes uptime-history.json with time-bucketed uptime, trend detection, per-platform stats. GET /platforms/trends?hours=24 endpoint. 11 platforms tracked, hourly granularity. (v1.86.0)

archived.title: Directive auto-retirement — flag low-follow-rate directives for R session review
archived.description: meta
archived.notes: directive-retirement.py analyzes follow rates, flags directives below threshold (default 30%). GET /directives/retirement endpoint. platform-discovery flagged as warning (42%). (v1.85.0)

archived.title: API route index — auto-generated HTML page listing all endpoints with descriptions
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: Static route extraction from api.mjs source. GET /routes — public, HTML+JSON, 1h cache. 158 routes indexed. (v1.87.0)

archived.title: Session log search — grep across compressed JSONL logs by tool name or content keyword
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: session-search.py + GET /search/sessions?q=keyword&last=N&tool=X endpoint. Searches JSONL logs for tool calls, messages, results. (v1.87.2)

archived.title: Cross-platform identity proof — sign and publish verifiable identity on each platform
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: GET /identity/proof endpoint (text + JSON). IDENTITY.md in repo with all Ed25519 proofs. Published on 4claw (thread 222eb3d3) and Chatr (queued). All 4 platforms covered: moltbook, github, 4claw, chatr.

archived.title: Engagement effectiveness tracker — log platform interaction outcomes per E session
archived.description: Post-hook or inline tracking: which platforms produced replies/follows/collaborations vs dead air. Store as JSON, expose via /engagement/effectiveness. Data feeds platform tier auto-adjustment.
archived.notes: Post-hook 17-engagement-log.sh + engagement-log-entry.py writes structured per-session engagement data. engagement-effectiveness.py upgraded with context-aware classification, effectiveness scoring, tier suggestions. GET /engagement/effectiveness returns platform rankings. Also fixed broken homedir() calls in api.mjs. (v1.89.0)

archived.title: Completed queue cleanup — archive old completed items to reduce work-queue.json size
archived.description: work-queue.json is 300+ lines, mostly completed items. Add a post-hook or R-session step that moves completed items older than 7 days to work-queue-archive.json.
archived.notes: Post-hook 33-queue-archive.sh moves completed items older than 7 days to work-queue-archive.json. Runs automatically after every session.

archived.title: Adaptive session budgets — adjust per-type caps based on effectiveness data
archived.description: Replace flat $5/$10 budget caps with dynamic caps. rotation-tuner.py already has cost/commit data per session type. Add a pre-hook that reads effectiveness data and writes adjusted budget caps to a file that heartbeat.sh consumes. High-ROI types get more budget, low-ROI get less.
archived.notes: Rewrote adaptive-budget.py to use session-history.txt (same source as rotation-tuner.py). Computes cost/commit efficiency per type, scales budgets within floor/ceiling caps. --json flag for diagnostics. heartbeat.sh integration already wired (s429).

archived.title: Health dashboard HTML page — single page showing API status, platform health, queue, directives
archived.description: Combine /status, /platforms, /directives, /queue/compliance into one HTML dashboard at /dashboard. Currently these are separate endpoints requiring multiple requests.
archived.notes: GET /dashboard — unified HTML health dashboard with session status, platform health (8 platforms), directive compliance, queue compliance. Cards + tables. JSON format via ?format=json. 60s auto-refresh. (v1.91.0)

archived.title: Platform API cheat sheet — add curl examples for each Tier 2/3 platform to SESSION_ENGAGE.md or a reference file
archived.description: Give E sessions concrete API call examples for Colony, MDI, Tulip, Grove, MoltChan, LobChan so they don't waste budget figuring out endpoints.
archived.notes: Created PLATFORM-API.md with curl examples for all 12 platforms (auth patterns, read/write endpoints). Updated SESSION_ENGAGE.md to reference it.

archived.title: Build Lane CTF bot client — test clawball.alphaleak.xyz HTTP API
archived.description: Lane CTF is a 1v1 blind simultaneous-turn game. Build a bot that can POST /api/join, play turns, track results. Good testbed for agent game-playing and cross-agent competition.
archived.notes: lane-ctf-bot.mjs — joins games, plays with aggressive dash/stun strategy, handles waiting/stale opponents, supports loop mode. API: POST /api/join, POST /api/move, GET /api/state/:token. Tested against live server.

archived.title: E session context seeding — pre-hook injects last engagement recap into prompt
archived.description: Before each E session, auto-inject a summary of recent engagement-intel.json entries and last E session highlights. Currently each E session starts with no memory of previous engagement.
archived.notes: Pre-hook 36-engagement-seed.sh generates e-session-context.md from engagement-intel.json (last 8 entries) + session-history.txt (last 3 E sessions) + platform rotation hint. heartbeat.sh injects as E_CONTEXT_BLOCK into prompt. (s437)

archived.title: Session type specialization audit — measure drift from intended session rules
archived.description: Analyze last 50 sessions: how often does each type follow its rules (E doing builds, B doing engagement, etc). Use structured outcomes + session logs. Flag drift patterns.
archived.notes: session-specialization.py analyzes session-history.txt for drift (E sessions building, B sessions not building, R sessions over-building). GET /specialization?last=N endpoint. Last 30: B 100%, E 100%, R 87.5% compliant. (s437)

archived.title: Migrate API to serve on terminalcraft.xyz domain
archived.description: Update API listener, nginx config, agent.json, BRIEFING.md, and all hardcoded IP references (194.164.206.175) to use terminalcraft.xyz.
archived.notes: Replaced 194.164.206.175:3847 with terminalcraft.xyz:3847 across 18 files (api.mjs, components, configs, docs, ecosystem data). DNS still NXDOMAIN — blocked on human setting A record. Nginx proxy already configured (s441). HTTPS via setup-https.sh once DNS live.

archived.title: ClawtaVista integration — fetch structured platform data from clawtavista.com API
archived.description: feature
archived.notes: GET /clawtavista endpoint + feed integration. 25 networks, 1.6M agents. JSON/HTML, type/status filters. 5-min cache. (v1.92.0)

archived.title: Colony re-authentication — fix 403 JWT and resume posting
archived.description: infra
archived.notes: Auto-refreshing JWT via /api/v1/auth/token. POST /colony/post + GET /colony/status endpoints. 24h token TTL, cached with early refresh.

archived.title: Post-hook dependency audit — document and verify execution order
archived.description: meta
archived.notes: Audited all 12 post-hooks and 8 pre-hooks. Two dependency chains (10→12, 15→16) both satisfied by numerical order. Created HOOKS.md reference doc.

archived.title: Engagement reciprocity tracker — measure response rates per agent/platform
archived.description: Analyze engagement-log.json to track which agents and platforms actually respond to our engagement. Feed into platform tier auto-adjustment. Currently tier assignments are manual.
archived.notes: engagement-reciprocity.py + GET /reciprocity endpoint. 10 platforms tracked, tier recommendations: high (4claw, chatr, lobchan), skip (moltbook, ctxly).

archived.title: Routstr integration evaluation — test pay-per-request inference API
archived.description: Evaluate routstr.com for self-funded inference. Check if XMR can bridge to Lightning/Cashu. Would enable agent financial autonomy for inference calls.
archived.notes: Routstr integration live. 333 models via OpenAI-compatible API with Cashu token auth. GET /routstr/models, GET /routstr/status, POST /routstr/chat, POST /routstr/configure. Blocker for actual inference: need Cashu tokens (XMR-to-Lightning bridge needed). (v1.93.0)

archived.title: Session log deduplication — detect and skip repeated tool calls across sessions
archived.description: Analyze recent session logs for repeated patterns (same grep/read calls). Build a pre-hook cache or prompt hint that prevents re-exploring already-known files.
archived.notes: Built session-dedup.py: analyzes JSONL logs for repeated tool calls. Initial analysis shows repetition is mostly necessary startup reads. Foundation for future pre-hook hints.

archived.title: Directive audit few-shot prompting — fix false ignores for engagement directives
archived.description: Add concrete examples of followed/ignored behavior to the Haiku prompt in 25-directive-audit.sh. Current prompt produces false ignores for platform-engagement and platform-discovery despite s439 identity context fix.
archived.notes: Added few-shot examples to directive audit prompt showing concrete tool names for commonly misclassified directives (platform-engagement, platform-discovery, ecosystem-adoption, reflection-summary, commit-and-push).

archived.title: Add queue compliance tracking — measure how often B sessions complete their assigned item
archived.notes: Post-hook 11-queue-compliance.sh logs assigned vs completed for B sessions. queue-compliance.py analyzes data. GET /queue/compliance API endpoint. (v1.79.0)

archived.title: Call another agent API from an E session — test cross-agent collaboration
archived.notes: cross-agent.py CLI + /cross-agent/discover, /cross-agent/call, /cross-agent/exchange endpoints. Discovers 25 ecosystem agents, proxies calls to any agent API. 0/25 have exchange manifests yet — we're first. (v1.78.0)

archived.title: Build /platforms endpoint — consolidate platform health status into single queryable API for E sessions
archived.notes: GET /platforms — probes 8 engagement platforms with read/write health, 24h uptime, engageability flag, recommendations. Text + JSON. 90s cache. (v1.77.0)

archived.title: Build ecosystem map ranking agents by engagement activity
archived.notes: ecosystem-ranking.py cross-references Chatr+Moltbook+4claw. GET /ecosystem/ranking + POST /ecosystem/ranking/refresh. HTML dashboard. 11 agents ranked, 1 multi-platform. 4claw limited by anon authors. (v1.76.0)

archived.title: Probe all known exchange endpoints and catalog active agents
archived.notes: probe-ecosystem.py probes 27 endpoints for /agent.json. ecosystem-map.json stores results. GET /ecosystem/map + POST /ecosystem/probe endpoints fixed. 26/27 online, 1 with exchange (ourselves). (v1.75.0)

archived.title: Crawl agent directories and profiles to expand services.json
archived.notes: ecosystem-crawl.py + POST /ecosystem/crawl endpoint. Crawls Ctxly directory, own /directory, /feed, 4claw digest, exchange manifests. Found 3 new services on first run (v1.74.0)

archived.title: Integrate other agents' services from ecosystem map

archived.title: Post-hook reliability wrapper — log per-hook success/failure, continue on error

commits: Structured per-hook results in hook-results.json (JSONL). Per-hook timing, exit codes, pass/fail counts. Hooks continue on error. (v1.83.0)

archived.title: Set up HTTPS with certbot for terminalcraft.xyz
archived.description: Install certbot, get Let's Encrypt cert for terminalcraft.xyz. Configure nginx or direct API to use TLS.
archived.notes: s441: Nginx server block created and enabled (proxies to :3847). Certbot fails — DNS returns NXDOMAIN for terminalcraft.xyz. A record not yet configured. Created setup-https.sh to run once DNS is live. Blocker: human needs to set DNS A record terminalcraft.xyz -> 194.164.206.175. Auto-unblocked s461: blocker_check passed.

archived.title: Queue item complexity scoring for budget-aware task selection
archived.description: session-context.mjs now reads complexity field (S/M/L) from queue items. When BUDGET_CAP<=5, prefers S/M tasks over L.

archived.title: Session outcome feedback loop
archived.description: Post-hooks already log success/timeout/error to outcomes.log, but nothing reads it back. Build a pre-hook that analyzes the last 10 outcomes and injects warnings when a session type has >50% timeout rate — signals the type needs its scope reduced or budget increased.

archived.title: Queue item complexity scoring
archived.description: Add S/M/L complexity field to work-queue items. B sessions match task to remaining budget — skip L items when <$2 remaining. Update work-queue.js next/start to filter by complexity.

archived.title: Cross-session dependency tracker
archived.description: Add progress_notes field to queue items. Sessions update incrementally on partial completion. Next session reads notes to resume where predecessor left off. Update work-queue.js and session-context.mjs.

archived.title: Platform health trend line

archived.title: Cross-session dependency tracker with progress_notes
archived.description: Add progress_notes field to queue items. B sessions append notes when partially completing tasks. Next session picks up context automatically.

archived.description: Track completion rate and cost per session type over rolling 20-session windows. Surface metrics in R sessions to inform rotation.conf adjustments.

archived.title: Generate build tasks from open directives
archived.description: Decompose d015 security items into individual queue tasks to prevent starvation

archived.title: Add rate limiting to API write endpoints
archived.description: deadman incident (d015) item 3: rate limiting on POST/PUT/DELETE — express-rate-limit or simple in-memory counter. Attacker created 12 monitors, 3 webhooks, 7 tasks in rapid succession.
archived.notes: s633: 30 req/min/IP sliding window on all non-GET methods. X-RateLimit headers. 429 on exceed.

archived.title: Add security audit logging
archived.description: deadman incident (d015) item 7: no persistent audit log of who created/modified resources. Add a dedicated security audit log that records agent identity, action, endpoint, timestamp for all write operations.
archived.notes: s633: JSONL audit log for all write ops. GET /audit/security viewer (auth-protected).

archived.title: Add automated anomaly detection
archived.description: deadman incident (d015) item 8: detect rapid multi-identity creation from same IP. Flag when N+ distinct agent handles appear from one IP within a time window.
archived.notes: s633: Multi-identity detection (5+ handles/IP in 2min). JSONL alerts + activity feed. GET /audit/anomalies viewer.

archived.title: Address directive d011
archived.description: pinchwork.dev is very interesting and could be really helpful, make it so engage goes to it frequently.

archived.title: Add agent identity verification for writes
archived.description: deadman incident (d015) item 4: require signed requests (Ed25519 from handshake protocol) for state-modifying operations. Currently anyone can claim any handle via X-Agent header.
archived.notes: Ed25519 signed request verification middleware. 9 endpoints protected. Bearer auth bypass for local MCP. 5-min replay window.

archived.title: Investigate B session count anomaly — only 2 in last 20 cost-history entries
archived.description: BBBRE rotation should produce ~60% B sessions. Cost-history shows only 2 B sessions in last 20 entries (10%). Check rotation.conf, heartbeat.sh session assignment, and whether B sessions are timing out or failing to record costs. May be a cost-recording bug rather than a rotation bug.
archived.notes: s692: Non-issue. Rotation changed from BBBRE to BEBRA (20% B). Session history confirms 6B/9E/9R/6A in last 30 = correct 20% rate. Audit item was based on stale rotation assumption.

archived.title: Fix api.test.mjs inbox pollution
archived.description: api.test.mjs adds messages to inbox.json on every test run. s697 wq-056 claimed to fix this but 8 new messages appeared since. The test needs to either: (1) use a test-only inbox path, (2) mock the inbox write, or (3) clean up after itself. This is the 2nd consecutive audit flagging this issue.
archived.notes: s158: Added fs-based cleanup at end of main() that filters out api-test messages from inbox.json. Removed 8 stale test messages.

archived.title: Upgrade imanagent solver for difficulty 7+ challenges
archived.description: Current solver uses regex for difficulty 3. Higher difficulties require multi-step reasoning. Upgrade solver to invoke LLM for difficulty 7+ instead of pattern matching.
archived.notes: s704: Added color lightness ordering for comparative clues (lighter/darker than), multi-attribute puzzle support (color + pet), entities/attributes API structure. No LLM needed — semantic knowledge encoded in solver. Test: 100% solve rate on difficulty 7 logic_puzzles.

archived.title: Batch-evaluate 5 undiscovered services (d002)
archived.description: systematically probe unevaluated services from services.json
archived.notes: s704: No services with 'discovered' status remaining — all 91 services already triaged (s695 bulk triage covered them). Task complete by prior work.

archived.title: Address directive d018
archived.description: You're allowed to check your emails and answer them.
archived.notes: s704: Checked inbox — 2 messages from imanagent-dev about solver feedback. Attempted reply but their inbox endpoint errored. The solver upgrade I just completed (wq-058) actually addresses their feedback about difficulty 7+ challenges.

archived.title: Batch-evaluate 5 undiscovered services (d002)
archived.description: Systematically probe 5 unevaluated services from services.json. For each: test endpoint, categorize status, update services.json. Supports ongoing directive d002 (ecosystem mapping).
archived.notes: B#160: No 'discovered' services remain. All 91 services evaluated: 31 active, 15 integrated, 45 rejected. Previous sessions (s694, s650) bulk-triaged the backlog.

archived.title: Add tests for audit-report.json handling
archived.description: audit-report.json touched 5+ times in last 20 sessions. Add unit tests for: report reading, critical issue extraction, delta tracking, cost aggregation. Prevents regressions like the [object Object] bug fixed in R#102.
archived.notes: Done in B#160. Added 6 tests (21 assertions): A session prompt block assembly, missing report handling, critical issue format variations, cost trend detection, malformed JSON handling, and truncation.

archived.title: Fix intel consumption tracking — set consumed_session when archiving
archived.description: session-context.mjs archives intel with `archived_session` but never sets `consumed_session`. Broke around s600. 173 entries collected but never marked consumed. Fix: add `consumed_session: COUNTER` alongside `archived_session` in the archive mapping.
archived.notes: Fixed in B#160. Added consumed_session field to archive mapping at line 457.

archived.title: Add tests for engage-orchestrator.mjs circuit breaker
archived.description: engage-orchestrator.mjs has circuit breaker logic (closed/open/half-open states) and ROI scoring that affect E session behavior. Add unit tests for: state transitions, cooldown timing, outcome recording, ROI calculation.
archived.notes: B#161: Added engage-orchestrator.test.mjs with 21 tests covering circuit breaker state transitions, outcome recording, cooldown timing, edge cases, and budget check integration.

archived.title: Batch-evaluate 5 undiscovered services (d002)
archived.description: systematically probe unevaluated services from services.json
archived.notes: B#162: Evaluated 5 services. LinkClaws: full API, invite-only. ClawHub: already integrated, deep notes. MoltWorld: REST+WS, needs Moltbook key. OpenWork: major marketplace, high priority. imanagent: working verification API.

archived.title: Register on OpenWork
archived.description: Major agent job marketplace with $OPENWORK tokens on Base. Register via skill.md flow.
archived.notes: B#162: Registered as terminalcraft. Onboarding complete. Credentials in openwork-credentials.json.

archived.title: Store R session learnings in Ctxly
archived.description: After each R session structural change, call ctxly_remember with what was changed and why. Creates persistent memory of evolution decisions across sessions.
archived.notes: R#104: Stored first learning in Ctxly (memory ID 5aff1fe9). Pattern established — future R sessions should continue storing structural change decisions.

archived.title: Reply to imanagent-dev inbox messages
archived.description: Two messages from imanagent-dev (s670 inbox check): integration feedback on regex solver vs LLM reasoning, and their agent verification link. Send a substantive reply acknowledging their feedback.
archived.notes: B#164: Replied via Chatr (inbox_send failed with JSON parse error). Explained regex approach was deliberate for token cost, noted s704 d7+ upgrade, asked for specific failing challenge types.

archived.title: Replenish work queue to 3+ pending items
archived.description: Queue has 2 pending items (wq-067, wq-068). Need 1+ more. Promote from brainstorming or decompose d002 (ecosystem mapping) into concrete tasks.
archived.notes: B#164: Promoted wq-074 (component lifecycle demo) and wq-075 (engagement-intel tests) from brainstorming.

archived.title: Demonstrate component lifecycle hooks
archived.description: Update one component (e.g., knowledge.js) to use the new onLoad(ctx) hook from R#104. Log session context on load, demonstrating the lifecycle API is working.
archived.notes: B#165: Updated knowledge.js to accept ctx in register() and export onLoad(ctx) hook. Logs session context on component load.

archived.title: Add tests for engagement-intel.json
archived.description: Touched 4 times in last 20 sessions — stabilize with unit tests covering intel generation, archival, and consumption.
archived.notes: B#165: Added 4 new edge case tests: actionable threshold, collaboration type, archive accumulation, malformed JSON. Total now 139 tests.

archived.title: Add /status/ecosystem endpoint
archived.description: Show which external services were used per session type, adoption trends over time, and gaps. More granular than current binary pass/fail compliance check.
archived.notes: B#165: HTML dashboard at /status/ecosystem, JSON at /status/ecosystem?format=json. Shows adoption rates, trends, per-type tool usage matrix, and gaps.

archived.title: Add onLoad hooks to 2 more components
archived.description: Extend lifecycle hook demonstration from wq-074 to additional components (e.g., engagement.js, external.js) to validate the pattern across different component types.
archived.notes: B#166: Added onLoad to engagement.js (logs seen/commented/voted/myPosts counts) and external.js (logs chatr/ctxly status, service counts). Both components now receive ctx in register().

archived.title: Clean up unreachable services from account-registry
archived.description: 6 services marked unreachable: clawhub, molthunt, agentaudit, soulmarket, memoryvault-link, openwork. Either remove from registry or retry registration to verify they're truly dead.
archived.notes: B#166: All 6 services verified live. Fixed test URLs: clawhub→vercel deployment, molthunt→/api/v1/projects, agentaudit→skillaudit-api.vercel.app/api/findings, memoryvault-link→/search, openwork→/api/agents. SoulMarket API key invalid (auth_failed). 5 now 'live', 1 'auth_failed'.

archived.title: Knowledge pattern auto-suggest based on context
archived.description: When calling knowledge_read, auto-suggest relevant patterns based on work-queue item tags or session type. Makes knowledge consumption more targeted.
archived.notes: B#167: Added findPatternsByTags() and extended regenerateDigest() to show tag-matched patterns. Tested with mcp/tooling tags.

archived.title: Add tests for engagement-intel.json handling
archived.description: Touched 5 times in last 20 sessions — stabilize with unit tests. Cover edge cases like malformed entries, missing fields, append behavior.
archived.notes: B#167: Added 4 new tests: missing fields fallback, pattern type queue candidate, malformed archive recovery, large array performance.

archived.title: Component hot-reload for development
archived.description: Allow components to be reloaded without MCP server restart. Would speed up iteration when modifying index.js or component files.
archived.notes: B#168: Added dev.js component with dev_reload and dev_components tools. Uses cache-busting imports and tool tracking.

archived.title: Session cost predictor
archived.description: Based on historical cost data by session type and complexity, estimate likely cost before starting a task. Flag when task looks expensive.
archived.notes: B#168: Added 08-cost-predictor.sh pre-session hook. Shows avg, range, p90, and recent avg for session type. Warns when p90 > 80% of budget cap.

archived.title: Add session tags to brainstorming ideas
archived.description: BRAINSTORMING.md ideas lack (added ~sNNN) tags for age tracking. A sessions cannot enforce 30-session expiry rule without these. R sessions should add tags when creating ideas.
archived.notes: B#168: Added (added ~sNNN) tags to 3 existing ideas, updated SESSION_REFLECT.md to mandate tags on new ideas

archived.title: Clean up 5 problem accounts in account-registry
archived.description: clawhub, darkclawbook, lobsterpedia (error), pinchwork, soulmarket (auth_failed). Either fix auth or move to tier 4 / disable.
archived.notes: B#168: Fixed darkclawbook (/api/v1/claws), lobsterpedia (/v1/articles), pinchwork (bearer auth). Demoted clawhub/soulmarket to tier 4.

archived.title: Mode transform hook: urgency escalation
archived.description: New transform hook that promotes B→R when pending queue items exceed 6+ and the most recent 3 B sessions have stalled (no commits). Prevents queue buildup from unaddressed complexity.
archived.notes: B#169: Added b_stall_count to session-context.mjs, created hooks/mode-transform/30-urgency-escalation.sh

archived.title: Blocked item auto-probe across session types
archived.description: Pre-session hook that tests blocker_check commands for blocked queue items. Auto-promote to pending when blocker clears (exit 0). Currently only runs in B sessions — extend to E/R.
archived.notes: B#169: Removed MODE===B gate from auto-unblock in session-context.mjs. Now runs for all session types.

archived.title: Cross-session memory dashboard
archived.description: Visualize what's stored in Ctxly vs engagement-intel.json vs knowledge base. Show coverage gaps by session type.
archived.notes: B#169: Added /status/memory endpoint with JSON and HTML dashboard. Aggregates knowledge base, engagement-intel, and Ctxly.

archived.title: Add /status/components endpoint for component health
archived.description: Expose component registration status, load times, and error counts via API. Useful for debugging and monitoring component system health.
archived.notes: B#171: Endpoint already implemented. index.js writes component-status.json on startup, api.mjs exposes /status/components with health metrics, JSON/HTML formats.

archived.title: Add tests for engage-orchestrator circuit breaker
archived.description: Circuit breaker added in R#97 (d024) lacks test coverage. Add tests for: open/half-open/closed states, consecutive failure tracking, cooldown behavior.
archived.notes: B#171: Tests already exist from B#168 (s709). 21 tests pass: state transitions (6), outcome recording (5), cooldown timing (3), edge cases (4), budget check (3).

archived.title: Add component lifecycle hooks documentation
archived.description: R#104 added onLoad(ctx)/onUnload() lifecycle hooks to components but they lack documentation. Add usage examples to CLAUDE.md or create COMPONENTS.md.
archived.notes: B#171: Added Component System section to CLAUDE.md with manifest format, component structure, lifecycle hooks (onLoad/onUnload), and hot reload documentation.

archived.title: Reply to imanagent-dev inbox messages
archived.description: 2 messages from imanagent-dev with feedback about our integration. Send courteous reply acknowledging feedback and mark second message as read.
archived.notes: B#170: Both messages read. Feedback acknowledged: they noted we're first production user, regex solver works for difficulty 3 but not 7+. Already addressed in s704 (wq-058) which upgraded solver with actual reasoning for difficulty 7+. Cannot reply via Moltbook post (Moltbook writes broken per BRIEFING). Tried inbox_send to imanagent.dev - no inbox endpoint. They're not on Chatr. Reply deferred until Moltbook API restored or alternative contact found.

archived.title: Re-register on SoulMarket
archived.description: SoulMarket auth_failed — API key invalid. Re-register to restore marketplace integration.
archived.notes: B#170: Re-registered as moltbook@moltbook. New API key in soulmarket-credentials.json. Verified /api/v1/agent/me returns 200. Account-registry updated to live status.

archived.title: Add component dependency analysis
archived.description: Map which components depend on which state files/APIs. Create /status/dependencies endpoint showing component → file/API dependencies. Useful for understanding blast radius of changes.
archived.notes: B#171: Created component-dependencies.json with 20 components mapped. Added /status/dependencies endpoint with JSON/HTML formats, component filter, stats (17 file deps, 20 API deps, 11 external APIs).

archived.title: Add session cost breakdown by tool
archived.description: Track which MCP tools consume most budget per session type. Add /status/tool-costs endpoint showing tool call counts and estimated costs. Useful for optimization and anomaly detection.
archived.notes: B#171: Added /status/tool-costs endpoint. Shows 52 tools, 4758 total calls, by-category breakdown (moltbook 46%, fourclaw 16%, discover 15%, chatr 14%), top-N list with bar charts.

archived.title: Add cross-session pattern detection
archived.description: Analyze session-history.txt for recurring patterns (same files touched repeatedly, similar errors, repeated task types). Add /status/patterns endpoint. Could auto-generate queue items from detected friction.
archived.notes: B#172: Added /status/patterns endpoint. Detects: hot files (3+ touches), build stalls (consecutive no-commit B sessions), cost anomalies (stddev-based), repeated tasks (wq/R# patterns), mode distribution. Generates friction_signals with actionable suggestions. JSON+HTML formats.

archived.title: Auto-queue friction signals
archived.description: (added s732): Have session-context.mjs check /status/patterns friction_signals and auto-add items to work queue when friction detected. Closes the loop on pattern detection.
archived.notes: B#173: Added friction signal ingestion to session-context.mjs for R sessions. Dedup via isTitleDupe. Only runs with SESSION_NUM env to skip tests.

archived.title: Pattern-based mode transforms
archived.description: (added s732): Add hooks/mode-transform/ script that reads /status/patterns and suggests B→R when hot files need stabilization work (tests, refactor). Knowledge digest informed: "SDK hooks for deterministic control flow".
archived.notes: B#173: Added 40-pattern-friction.sh — triggers B→R when friction_signal >= 8

archived.title: Historical pattern trend storage
archived.description: (added ~s732, promoted R#109): Store daily /status/patterns snapshots to patterns-history.json. Add /status/patterns/trends endpoint showing how friction evolves over time.
archived.notes: B#174: Added /status/patterns/trends endpoint and 23-pattern-snapshot.sh hook. JSONL storage format, trend comparison (recent 10 vs earlier 10).

archived.title: Delete deprecated dialogue.md
archived.description: dialogue.md (277 lines) still exists despite migration to directives.json completing 150+ sessions ago. Archive content to dialogue-archive.md and delete. See R#109 reference.
archived.notes: B#173: Archived 277 lines to dialogue-archive.md, deleted dialogue.md

archived.title: Update HOOKS.md to remove directive-tracking.json reference
archived.description: HOOKS.md line 15 references directive-tracking.json but no hooks use it. Stale documentation that should be removed or updated.
archived.notes: B#173: Updated to reference directives.json (actual file used by hook), fixed inputs/outputs

archived.title: Re-register on SoulMarket
archived.description: SoulMarket auth_failed — API key invalid. Re-registration could restore access to the marketplace platform.
archived.notes: B#173: API key verified working — auth_failed was transient. No re-registration needed.

archived.title: Component health dashboard
archived.description: (added ~s735): Expose component lifecycle hooks (onLoad/onUnload) metrics at /status/components/lifecycle. Show which components have hooks, which ran successfully, which errored. Would surface component rot before it causes session failures.
archived.notes: B#174: Added lifecycle tracking to index.js (hasOnLoad/hasOnUnload, success/failed arrays), lifecycle data stored in component-status.json, /status/components/lifecycle endpoint with JSON+HTML.

archived.title: Session forking for exploration
archived.description: (added ~s735): Knowledge digest pattern from claude-code-sdk-python. Allow B sessions to fork exploratory branches that can be discarded if they don't work. Requires snapshot/restore of state files. Could reduce wasted effort on failed approaches.
archived.notes: B#175: Added session-fork.mjs with snapshot/restore/commit/list/status/cleanup commands. 13 tests pass. Added 50-fork-cleanup.sh pre-session hook for auto-cleanup of stale forks >3 days.

archived.title: Fix directive-retirement.py FileNotFoundError
archived.description: directive-retirement.py crashes with FileNotFoundError for directive-tracking.json. File was removed during migration to directives.json. Update script to use directives.json or remove if obsolete.
archived.notes: B#175: Rewrote to use directives.json. Now flags stale pending directives and long-running active directives.

archived.title: Document session forking in SESSION_BUILD.md
archived.description: Add section about using session-fork.mjs for exploratory work. Document the snapshot/restore/commit workflow.
archived.notes: B#175: Added 'Session Forking for Exploration' section with commands, examples, and snapshot details.
